textArr:
The Waterfalls of This state in the Northern part of Borneo, is largely covered with tropical rainforest. Many of its numerous waterfalls still have to be explored 
   
   


	   Accessability: Easy
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Kinabalu Park FallsKinabalu National Park
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Carlson is on the trail to Kinabalu. Kipungit has easy access from the Poring Resort. For Langanan trekking is needed. The Kadamaian fall still has to be xploredLast update December 2011
	 
	  
	  Kionsom FallKampung Kobuni Ulu Kionsom, Inanam, Kota Kinabalu
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Popular waterfall, near Kota KinabaluLast update December 2011
	 
	  
	  Madai FallNear Kunak town
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Popular fall in well maintained recreation parkLast update February 2010
	 
	   Accessability: Moderate
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Mahua Fallnear Kg Patau,15 minutes from Tambunan
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Beautiful vertical waterfallLast update November 2006
	 
	   Accessability: Difficult
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  The Maliau Basin6 hours by 4WD from Tawau
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Beautiful falls in the as yet unspoilt interior of SabahLast update May 2005
